item.title: Scottish Greens co-leaders Harvie and Slater to be given minister roles
item.description: The Scottish Green Party is to confirm that Patrick Harvie and Lorna Slater will become ministers if a new power sharing deal is approved.

item.title: John McAleese: The SAS soldier who was the man behind the mask

item.title: Scotland's papers: Hospital backlogs and Rangers Covid cases

item.title: Steven Gerrard: Rangers manager not with Covid-hit squad in Armenia
